product_name: NYX Professional MakeupCan't Stop Won't Stop 24HR Full Coverage Matte Concealer
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackNYX Professional Makeup Can't Stop Won't Stop Contour Concealer is a vegan, full coverage, lightweight, longwear multitasking concealer that won't transfer!
details: DetailsBenefitsFull coverage multitasking liquid concealer with a matte finishLongwear, no transfer, waterproof formula that lasts for up to 24 hrsUse blendable concealer to camouflage & cover imperfections, brighten up your under eye area & contour to perfectionThis vegan concealer is made for all skin types and complexions, available in 24 shadesPair our longwearing concealer with its complementary Can't Stop Won't Stop Full Coverage FoundationVegan formula (no animal-derived ingredient or by-product)Cruelty freeItem 2538474How To UseDab NYX Professional Makeup Can't Stop Won't Stop Contour Concealer over any spots you'd like to hide or onto areas of the face you wish to illuminate and define. Blend the liquid well using a sponge, like the Complete Control Blending Sponge.Pro Tip: Use on the lids for a quick shadow base.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Cyclopentasiloxane, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Cyclohexasiloxane, Butylene Glycol, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Polyglyceryl-3 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Silica Dimethyl Silylate [Nano], Sodium Chloride, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Dimethicone, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Aluminum Hydroxide, Disodium EDTA, Propylene Carbonate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Ethylhexylglycerin, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Tocopherol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Phenoxyethanol. May Contain: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).
how_to_use: Dab NYX Professional Makeup Can't Stop Won't Stop Contour Concealer over any spots you'd like to hide or onto areas of the face you wish to illuminate and define. Blend the liquid well using a sponge, like the Complete Control Blending Sponge.Pro Tip: Use on the lids for a quick shadow base.

reviews.headline: Does not blend!!!
reviews.comments: I bought this and was really exicited to try it, only to hate it. I bought a dark shade for contour (the packaging says concealer/contour) and it only smeared, never actually blended. It is splotchy and sticky. Don't buy this!!

reviews.headline: The best
reviews.comments: Please do not ever discontinue, the only concealer that doesn't break me out.Covers everything like a dream.

reviews.headline: The best coverage!!!
reviews.comments: I have been buying and using this coverage for a few years!! It's the best natural concealer!!

reviews.headline: I by multiple
reviews.comments: This concealer goes on great and stays . I love the coverage . Easy to apply !

reviews.headline: It's a no
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this but it was to drying for me. I have mature skin and need a more hydrated concealer

reviews.headline: would not buy this again
reviews.comments: absolutely regret buying this concealer. it tends to not have that full coverage look that I go for when I want a full coverage look. It ends up separating under my eye and making my dark circles very noticable. 2/10 wouldn't buy again.

reviews.headline: Found the perfect shade
reviews.comments: I have hard time matching my skin tone to make up. My skin is pretty fair with cool undertones. Alabaster is the perfect shade!! Plus its a good product

reviews.headline: I would purchase this item again
reviews.comments: This product is very good for beginner I highly recommend

reviews.headline: Decent coverage but hard to blend.
reviews.comments: For me, this concealer was a little hard to blend, like as soon as I put it on it started to get dry and so I usually had to wet my sponge to then blend it.

reviews.headline: Dont buy!
reviews.comments: It is pretty much see-thru, no coverage whatsoever! Watery.  Don't buy this!

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: No matter how much I moisturized beneath this foundation, it felt like a clay mask. It looked super cakey and dry on my face, which is surprising because I have oily skin. It also made me skin feel warm, and I ended up taking it up within a couple of hours because I couldn't stand the way it felt.

reviews.headline: Meh
reviews.comments: Not my favorite which is sad. It does ok but it gets streaky and creases

reviews.headline: Meh
reviews.comments: Not my favorite which is sad. It does ok but it gets streaky and creases

reviews.headline: Good value
reviews.comments: I find this product to work as well as other more expensive ones. Also it has a large selection of shades.

reviews.headline: Not my fav
reviews.comments: Grabbed this when I was traveling and had forgot to pack my concealer. I kind of had high hopes cause I usually love NYX products but this one wasnt my favorite. I found it very hard to blend and it seemes like the product dried really fast which madd things harder. Couldn't get a nice smooth look with this prodcuct unfortunately

reviews.headline: EBS
reviews.comments: Its a pretty good concealer and inexpensive

reviews.headline: Too little product for the price
reviews.comments:
The formula is good - nothing crazy, but I did enjoy using it. HOWEVER, I hadn't realized there was only .11 oz in the tube until I had to start scraping the sides of the tube way sooner compared to other concealers I've used in the past. For reference, most concealers I've used (maybelline FitMe or efl camo) have .20 oz, and many have .30 oz (like colourpop). With the amount you're given for just under $10, the price isn't really more affordable than higher end brands that charge $30 for .30 oz.
Extremely disapointing

reviews.headline: Useless Product
reviews.comments: While this profuct does feel lightweight and blends easily, I cant think of a single situation in which you would use it. There is NO coverge! I have pretty pale skin and got light ivory which was a good match for my skintone, but it didn't even kind of cover any blemishes, my undet eye, or the pinkness I have around my nose. It doesnt even work as a contour or highlighter.

reviews.headline: I would purchase this item again
reviews.comments: This is my everyday concealer it is very good if you want a light weight but brightning!

reviews.headline: Do not recommend at all
reviews.comments: I used this (im a full coverage girly with dry skin) on top of my nars foundation and with my elf setting spray to add moisture back into my face. As soon as i started blending it seperated and i had to try to fix the separation. In the end it made my undereyes super dry and flaky. Not full coverage. And just didnt sit well on too of my makeup. If it works for you great! For me its a no - a woman who has tried many concealers. By far this is the WORST ive tried

media.headline: Love This Concealer

faceoff_positive.comments: I've used this concealer consistently for about 2 weeks now both within my everyday make up routine (foundation, highlight etc) and on my "no makeup makeup" days just concealer where I want to brighten some mascara and a little liquid highlight and it's perfect for both looks! It's a buildable concealer that is thick but not heavy and blends so easily with both a beauty sponge and a brush! I'll fefinitely keep this in stock for ALL my makeup needs
faceoff_positive.headline: Blendable and Buildable!

faceoff_negative.comments: I'm in the fence about this product. On one hand, I absolutely love the formula and how full coverage it is. You can't see anything (undereye bags, scars, discoloration) under it, and it's really creamy, but on the other hand, the finish is matte. Personally, I prefer my base to be more on the dewy side. Even though it's matte, it doesn't crease or anything, and it stays on all day. If you like matte concealers, this one will be perfect for you!
faceoff_negative.headline: Long lasting and great coverage

rollup.name: Can't Stop Won't Stop 24HR Full Coverage Matte Concealer
